description: Result of a single file handle restore operation.

fileHandleId.description: The id of the file handle in the original restore request.

status.description: The status of the restore operation on the file handle.
status.name: FileHandleRestoreStatus

enum.name: NOT_FOUND
enum.description: The file handle did not exist

enum.name: UNAUTHORIZED
enum.description: The user was not the owner of the file handle

enum.name: FAILED
enum.description: The operation failed and might be retried on a later moment

enum.name: NO_ACTION
enum.description: The file handle was already AVAILABLE or a restore operation is already in progress

enum.name: RESTORED
enum.description: The file handle was set back to AVAILABLE

enum.name: RESTORING
enum.description: The file handle is currently being restored and will be set back to AVAILABLE when possible

statusMessage.description: A descriptive message for the status
